thread.title: S.F. cop hurt in confrontation with suspected auto thief
thread.title_full: S.F. cop hurt in confrontation with suspected auto thief - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Kale Williams
title: S.F. cop hurt in confrontation with suspected auto thief
text:
Photo: Google Maps A police officer was hurt in San Francisco's Bernal Heights neighborhood when an auto burglary suspect tried to run him over the night of Oct. 5, 2015. A police officer was hurt in San Francisco's Bernal Heights...
A police officer was injured in San Francisco Sunday night when an auto burglary suspect tried to run him over, pinning him against his patrol car, authorities said. A police officer was hurt in San Francisco's Bernal Heights neighborhood when an auto burglary suspect tried to run him over the night of Oct. 5, 2015. A police officer was hurt in San Francisco's Bernal Heights...
A police officer was injured in San Francisco Sunday night when an auto burglary suspect tried to run him over, pinning him against his patrol car, authorities said.
